content: this beginner pattern is good introduction to colourwork and a perfect way to use up leftover super bulky yarn the pattern is worked over a 4 stitch repeat with short floats **part of the pandemic pattern bundle 1 a series of beginner-friendly patterns designed to help people find a new hobby while they stay at home ** you will need * 2 balls of lion brand thick and quick or other bulky yarn i only used half a ball of each * 9mm size 13 circular needle 24 * stitch marker notes * your gauge should be 9 stitches by 12 row = 4 x 4 on size 13 needles * for those new to colourwork floats refers to the strands carried across the back of your work * you don t want your floats to be too tight or loose so this might require some practice - bulky yarn makes this easier 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/free-pandemic-patterns
